values:
I L-O-V-E this song. Dearly. Soooo wonderful. Gawd. How is electronic/lo-fi pop so intensely godlike?



I'm sick of seeing you cry
And wasting all your time
On someone who will never care enough
To make you feel loved
To make you feel safe
I would drop my life to take his place

To show you just how good
Being touched could be
Commit these words to memory
For when you find yourself
Pinned under his demands
I am still an option that you have

So carry me around
Like a picture in your purse
Pull me out when things are at their worst

You can show up at my house
Completely unannounced
We'll have that movie kiss we talked about

Where there are no words
Just a soft and gentle score
Our ears will ring from all the strings

We'll let the screen go black
And watch the credits run
And see the names of every one

Who we ever met
And who we ever missed
Each one had a role in this

It's just another film that won't get made
I'm sick of seeing you cry

LAYER ONE:

-- Name: kait

-- Birth date: october 18th, 1988

-- Birthplace: bridgeport, ct

-- Current Location: e.h.

-- Eye Color: brown

-- Hair Color: brown

-- Height: 5'7"

-- Righty or Lefty: righty

-- Zodiac Sign: libra


LAYER TWO:

-- Your heritage: danish/latvian/puerto rican/italian

-- The shoes you wore today: palladium hyaline's

-- Your weakness: pretty hair, poetry, true love...and pudding

-- Your fears: being alone forever, heights, the dark

-- Your perfect pizza: mushroom!

-- Goal you'd like to achieve: writer...famous one. with lots of happiness.


LAYER THREE:

-- Your most overused phrase on AIM: lol probably...yeah- typical, I know

-- Your thoughts first waking up: ahh!

-- Your bedtime: around 12 schoolnights. other nights who knows?

-- Your most missed memory: love


LAYER FOUR:

-- Pepsi or Coke: pepsi, babay

-- McDonald's or Burger King: phuck that. taco bell

-- Single or group dates: single- more personal

-- Adidas or Nike: puma

-- Iced Tea or Nestea: Iced tea. Nestea is GROSS

-- Chocolate or vanilla: vanilla

-- Cappuccino or coffee: cappuccino. definately.

LAYER FIVE:

-- Smoke: nope

-- Cuss: in moderation

-- Sing: only when no one's around

-- Take a shower every day: i try

-- Have a crush: i don't crush and tell ;)

-- Do you think you've been in love: I -know- I've been in love

-- Want to go to college: somewhat- but I don't really have a choice

-- Like(d) high school: no.

-- Want to get married: yes.

-- Believe in yourself: mm. always

-- Get motion sickness: on swings

-- Think you're attractive: sometimes

-- Think you're a health freak: not at all

-- Get along with your parent(s): surely. 

-- Like thunderstorms: one of my 'top 5' babay! (in other words that's a big YES)

-- Play an instrument: no. but i wanna play the upright bass. Badly!


LAYER SIX:
(In the past month...)

-- Drank alcohol: nope

-- Smoked: nope

-- Done a drug: nope

-- Had Sex: nope

-- Made Out: nope

-- Gone on a date: nope

-- Gone to the mall?: nope

-- Eaten an entire box of Oreos: nope

-- Eaten sushi: nope

-- Been on stage: yup

-- Been dumped: nope

-- Gone skating: nope

-- Made homemade cookies: nope

-- Gone skinny dipping: not in winter

-- Dyed your hair: nope

-- Stolen anything: nope


LAYER SEVEN:
(Have you ever...)

-- Played a game that required removal of clothing: sure have. lost, too.

-- If so, was it mixed company: very

-- Been trashed or extremely intoxicated: yes

-- Been caught "doing something": HIKERS. Ack. that's a big yes.

-- Been called a tease: yes

-- Gotten beaten up: nope- beat somebody up tho (I didn't even mean to)

-- Shoplifted: a few times. but it's bad.

-- Changed who you were to fit in: 7th and 8th grade. ack. it was useless.

LAYER EIGHT:

-- Age you hope to be married: whenever the urge strikes.

-- Numbers and Names of Children: 1 boy 1 girl. scarlet and jack!

-- Describe your Dream Wedding: a nice one

-- How do you want to die: a legend.

-- Where you want to go to college: columbia university! creative writing.

-- What do you want to be when you grow up: writer/poet/philosopher/folk hero

-- What country would you most like to visit: latvia or ireland


LAYER NINE:
(In a guy...)

-- Best eye color? dark.

-- Best hair color? dark.

-- Short or long hair: medium. long as it's dark.

-- Height: taller than i!

-- Best weight: average. 

-- Best first date location: someplace awesome

-- Best first kiss location: someplace awesome during a thunderstorm


LAYER TEN:

-- # of drugs taken illegally: 2

-- # of people I could trust with my life: a few

-- # of CDs that I own: lots

-- # of piercings: 5

-- # of tattoos: 0

-- # of scars on my body: lots

-- # of things in my past that I regret: -nothing.-

You Were a Little Naughty This Year!
While you're not likely to greet Santa with sucker punch... He's still not too jolly about coming to your house. You might get a small token from Mr. Claus Like some detox pills for your liver.
